content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=-14.5, y=-46.5) and (x=-14.5, y=-45.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source chest or entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Regularly check and refill the source entities to prevent idle inserters.

### Chest Full Warnings
- Regularly empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of connected drills or assemblers. This will prevent stoppages in production lines.

### Furnaces with No Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of raw materials to process. Monitor and maintain the supply chain to prevent furnaces from running out of ingredients to smelt.
